text: Khurshit Lutfullayev is a Kyrgyzstani footballer. He is a member of the Kyrgyzstan national football team. He currently play for FC Abdish-Ata Kant. ==Career== By the end of the 2013 season, Lutfullayev reached the milestone of scoring at least 100 goals in Kyrgyzstan League and Cup matches. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !colspan=3|Kyrgyzstan national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2007||6||2 |- |2008||2||0 |- |2009||0||0 |- |2010||0||0 |- |2011||0||0 |- |2012||0||0 |- |2013||2||0 |- |2014||2||0 |- |2015||0||0 |- !Total||12||2 |} Statistics accurate as of match played 23 May 2015 ===International goals=== {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
